title: WSB's Weekend Bite Week Ending May 13: Stock Pick For 2022; Why ARKK Is A Sell Or Maybe A Short
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: This week we discuss one big stock idea for the year, why the ARKK fund is a sell (or maybe even a short) and the upcoming Russell reconstitution. With Chris DeMuth Jr., Founder of Sifting the World, a Seeking Alpha Marketplace service.
